item.description:
The last two BPC Photoshop workshops I'm teaching have a few spaces available... we're also opening these up to Digital Arts members. $36 payment is due when you sign up. Spots will not be held until payment is received. Please email me if you have any questions.

The final workshop isn't necessarily for the advanced user, rather to give beginning users additional strategies for enhancing photographs. This session will focus on color to black and white conversion, and techniques for editing in the LAB color space. A photo editing workflow will be shown that adds noise reduction, lighting, and sharpening effects that build on your knowledge of filters, layers, and channels.

- In Depth look at the channels palette
- The RGB, CMYK, LAB, and Grayscale color spaces
- Editing in the Luminosity channel
- Black & White conversion and duotone tinting
- Lighting Effects
- Noise reduction and Smoothing techniques
- Advanced sharpening techniques
- Photo editing workflows

group.name: The Boston Digital Arts Meetup Group

item.name: Photoshop 104 Workshop: Channels and Filters
